channel.title: Far From Reality (BETA)
channel.description:
[size=24pt]Far From Reality[/size]
[i]Hello everyone to my development thread. Sorry its so crappy just in a hurry.
Current reason im doing this: Because i want moparscape to have a nice community of old runescape servers. This is like the old runescape, has the old gameframe.
So far what ive gotten done is.
[b]Features:[/b] Dupeing does NOT work Perfect Combat All Skills Work NPC's will talk to you Tree spirit Level requirements Fixed doors MORE!
[b]Theres still a lot more to finish like..[/b] NPC clipping Add more NPC's to cities Clean it up a bit Add more features..minigames, quests, ETC..
Team:
Developer/Host: Pot (me)
Coder: Open Spots
Website developer: Open Spots (I can do this too if no one wants this spot)
BETA testers: Open Spots
Current Ranks:
[img]http://i199.photobucket.com/albums/aa270/beastscape/owner-1.png[/img] - Pot [img]http://i199.photobucket.com/albums/aa270/beastscape/admin-1.png[/img] - Open, Open [img]http://i199.photobucket.com/albums/aa270/beastscape/moderator.png[/img] - Open, Open, Open, Open, Open [img]http://i199.photobucket.com/albums/aa270/beastscape/vip.png[/img] - For Anyone Who Donates
Here are some pictures below of the server.
Pictures:
Some Skills:
Theiving [img]http://i199.photobucket.com/albums/aa270/beastscape/Theive.png[/img] Range [img]http://i199.photobucket.com/albums/aa270/beastscape/Range.png[/img] Prayer [img]http://i199.photobucket.com/albums/aa270/beastscape/Prayer.png[/img] Firemaking [img]http://i199.photobucket.com/albums/aa270/beastscape/Firemaking.png[/img]
If anyone would like to be apart of this team and help us make it better, Just send me a PM and ill answer you ASAP.
[/i]

item.title: Far From Reality (BETA)
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

Yeah NPC Clipping is important. The range picture is weird.

item.title: Far From Reality (BETA)
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

Goodluck.

There’s no such thing as perfect combat by the way, but if it’s really that good, just say “amazing combat”

Read full topic

                                                                    [size=24pt]Far From Reality[/size]

[i]Hello everyone to my development thread. Sorry its so crappy just in a hurry.

Current reason im doing this: Because i want moparscape to have a nice community of old runescape servers.
This is like the old runescape, has the old gameframe.

So far what ive gotten done is.
